doc:div.p: Commercial support services are available from Rabbit Technologies, LShift, and CohesiveFT - helping you to evaluate the potential that AMQP offers your enterprise.

ul.li: Assess your existing messaging strategies and plan your migration to, or integration with RabbitMQ
Register to Build and Download a free RabbitMQ Elastic Server™
Fast encoding of FPML over RabbitMQ for post-trade support
Trade consolidation from FIX connections onto a RabbitMQ bus
Integration of RabbitMQ to service bus implementations like Mule or ServiceMix
Realise the benefits of an architecture that offers exceptionally high reliability, availability and scalability

doc:div.p: For more information you can join our mailing list, or alternatively contact us directly at info@rabbitmq.com.
